content.question: Which of the following best explains the point of view of the passage?

choices.label: English citizens have too much political power and must devolve more.
Scotland and Wales need to share more power.
English citizens receive too little from Westminster.
Taxes on English citizens are too high and need to be reduced.

content.answer: English citizens receive too little from Westminster.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how the author's argument or perspective relates to political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
